TEXT.English: "You youngsters are all alike, bitter to be stuck here in garrison and not '‘gathering glory' with the armies. Well beyond the fact I'll wager you'd soil your breaches the first time a horde of pyre zombies struck your line, you miss the point of war. Wars may be won in battle, but it's getting the troops to that battle, supplied, paid and fed that is the key. Do you think that could happen without security? Do you think all those supplies that go through here to the front would magically get there safely if we weren't here? Tis not a glamorous job we do here, boy, but if it weren't for us, many of those great victories that the bards sing about wouldn't have happened."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]Scuttlebutt over cards and dice, Fort Kiel in the Haridrine pass along the Malakim/Sheaim border.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In a dangerous world and with armies often spread out over vast areas, civilians and militia have always counted on the protection of the local garrison fort. Beyond the defensive benefit, a garrison fort reminds the people of the land who rules the land. Fort Commanders, like feudal lords, are a rulers eyes and ears over his people and his lands.
TEXT.French: "You youngsters are all alike, bitter to be stuck here in garrison and not '‘gathering glory' with the armies. Well beyond the fact I'll wager you'd soil your breaches the first time a horde of pyre zombies struck your line, you miss the point of war. Wars may be won in battle, but it's getting the troops to that battle, supplied, paid and fed that is the key. Do you think that could happen without security? Do you think all those supplies that go through here to the front would magically get there safely if we weren't here? Tis not a glamorous job we do here, boy, but if it weren't for us, many of those great victories that the bards sing about wouldn't have happened."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]Scuttlebutt over cards and dice, Fort Kiel in the Haridrine pass along the Malakim/Sheaim border.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In a dangerous world and with armies often spread out over vast areas, civilians and militia have always counted on the protection of the local garrison fort. Beyond the defensive benefit, a garrison fort reminds the people of the land who rules the land. Fort Commanders, like feudal lords, are a rulers eyes and ears over his people and his lands.

Wars may be won in battle, but it's getting the troops to that battle, supplied, paid and fed that is the key. Do you think that could happen without security? Do you think all those supplies that go through here to the front would magically get there safely if we weren't here? Tis not a glamorous job we do here, boy, but if it weren't for us, many of those great victories that the bards sing about wouldn't have happened."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]Scuttlebutt over cards and dice, Fort Kiel in the Haridrine pass along the Malakim/Sheaim border.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In a dangerous world and with armies often spread out over vast areas, civilians and militia have always counted on the protection of the local garrison fort. TEXT.English: While the defensive bonus of the fort and the bombard ability of the Fort Commander are important, one of the most strategic uses of forts is the ability to claim land when one cannot afford to place a settler in that area. Unique features and important resources can thus be claimed and kept from bordering civs. Furthermore, as the fort ages, it's cultural boundary will increase and allow for workers upgrades. Then when a settler is available, the new city will already have worked tiles.
TEXT.French: While the defensive bonus of the fort and the bombard ability of the Fort Commander are important, one of the most strategic uses of forts is the ability to claim land when one cannot afford to place a settler in that area. Unique features and important resources can thus be claimed and kept from bordering civs. Furthermore, as the fort ages, it's cultural boundary will increase and allow for workers upgrades. Then when a settler is available, the new city will already have worked tiles.
TEXT.German: While the defensive bonus of the fort and the bombard ability of the Fort Commander are important, one of the most strategic uses of forts is the ability to claim land when one cannot afford to place a settler in that area. Unique features and important resources can thus be claimed and kept from bordering civs. Furthermore, as the fort ages, it's cultural boundary will increase and allow for workers upgrades. Then when a settler is available, the new city will already have worked tiles.
TEXT.Italian: While the defensive bonus of the fort and the bombard ability of the Fort Commander are important, one of the most strategic uses of forts is the ability to claim land when one cannot afford to place a settler in that area. Unique features and important resources can thus be claimed and kept from bordering civs. Furthermore, as the fort ages, it's cultural boundary will increase and allow for workers upgrades. Then when a settler is available, the new city will already have worked tiles.
TEXT.Spanish: While the defensive bonus of the fort and the bombard ability of the Fort Commander are important, one of the most strategic uses of forts is the ability to claim land when one cannot afford to place a settler in that area. Unique features and important resources can thus be claimed and kept from bordering civs. Furthermore, as the fort ages, it's cultural boundary will increase and allow for workers upgrades. Then when a settler is available, the new city will already have worked tiles.

TEXT.English: Extends territory around commander by +1 tile radius
TEXT.French: Extends territory around commander by +1 tile radius
TEXT.German: Erweitert das Gebiet um den Kommandanten um +1 Radius
TEXT.Italian: Extends territory around commander by +1 tile radius
TEXT.Spanish: Extends territory around commander by +1 tile radius

TEXT.English: Extends territory around commander by +2 tile radius
TEXT.French: Extends territory around commander by +2 tile radius
TEXT.German: Erweitert das Gebiet um den Kommandanten um +2 Radius
TEXT.Italian: Extends territory around commander by +2 tile radius
TEXT.Spanish: Extends territory around commander by +2 tile radius

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Expands unit's owner territory to the tile
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Étend le territoire du propriétaire à la case
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erweitert das Gebiet des Besitzers der Einheit auf dieses Feld
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Expands unit's owner territory to the tile
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Expands unit's owner territory to the tile

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be cast on Grassland or Wetlands tiles[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Creates a Jungle on the tile
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be cast on Grassland or Wetlands tiles[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Creates a Jungle on the tile
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann nur auf Grasland oder Feuchtgebieten gezaubert werden.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erschafft einen Dschungel auf dem Feld
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be cast on Grassland or Wetlands tiles[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Creates a Jungle on the tile
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be cast on Grassland or Wetlands tiles[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Creates a Jungle on the tile

TEXT.English: Your unit arrives at the dungeon entrance to find a weary party of adventurers nursing their wounds. They are injured and low on supplies, but seem to have successfully raided the dungeon. After much negotiation, your unit trades them some rations and medical necessities for a share of the equipment they looted from the dungeon.
TEXT.French: Your unit arrives at the dungeon entrance to find a weary party of adventurers nursing their wounds. They are injured and low on supplies, but seem to have successfully raided the dungeon. After much negotiation, your unit trades them some rations and medical necessities for a share of the equipment they looted from the dungeon.
TEXT.German: Your unit arrives at the dungeon entrance to find a weary party of adventurers nursing their wounds. They are injured and low on supplies, but seem to have successfully raided the dungeon. After much negotiation, your unit trades them some rations and medical necessities for a share of the equipment they looted from the dungeon.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit arrives at the dungeon entrance to find a weary party of adventurers nursing their wounds. They are injured and low on supplies, but seem to have successfully raided the dungeon. After much negotiation, your unit trades them some rations and medical necessities for a share of the equipment they looted from the dungeon.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit arrives at the dungeon entrance to find a weary party of adventurers nursing their wounds. They are injured and low on supplies, but seem to have successfully raided the dungeon. After much negotiation, your unit trades them some rations and medical necessities for a share of the equipment they looted from the dungeon.

TEXT.English: Grants xp equal to the caster's level to a D'teshi Commander on the same tile.
TEXT.French: Grants xp equal to the caster's level to a D'teshi Commander on the same tile.
TEXT.German: überträgt eine dem Level des Zaubernden entsprechende Zahl an Erfahrung auf einen D'teshi Kommandanten auf demselben Feld.
TEXT.Italian: Grants xp equal to the caster's level to a D'teshi Commander on the same tile.
TEXT.Spanish: Grants xp equal to the caster's level to a D'teshi Commander on the same tile.

TEXT.English: Destroys the fort when the unit dies.
TEXT.French: Détruit le fort quand l'unité meurt.
TEXT.German: Zerstört das Fort bei Tod der Einheit.
TEXT.Italian: Destroys the fort when the unit dies.
TEXT.Spanish: Destroys the fort when the unit dies.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]If all three shards are equipped on the same unit, and brought to Pristin Pass, something may happen...
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]If all three shards are equipped on the same unit, and brought to Pristin Pass, something may happen...
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wenn alle drei Scherben in Besitz derselben Einheit sind und zum Pass des Pristinus gebracht werden, ja, dann könnte dort etwas passieren....
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]If all three shards are equipped on the same unit, and brought to Pristin Pass, something may happen...
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]If all three shards are equipped on the same unit, and brought to Pristin Pass, something may happen...

TEXT.English: Take the Bow of the Long-Sighted
TEXT.French: Take the Bow of the Long-Sighted
TEXT.Italian: Take the Bow of the Long-Sighted
TEXT.Spanish: Take the Bow of the Long-Sighted

TEXT.French: Maître du Corps et de l'Enchantement
TEXT.German: Meister des Körpers und der Verzauberung

TEXT.French: Maître du Chaos et de l'Entropie
TEXT.German: Meister des Chaos und der Entropie

TEXT.French: Maître de la Mort et de l'Ombre
TEXT.German: Meister des Todes und des Schattens

TEXT.French: Maître de la Terre et de l'Air
TEXT.German: Meister der Erde und der Luft

TEXT.French: Maître du Feu et de l'Eau
Maître de la Loi et du Soleil

TEXT.German: Meister der Schöpfung und der Natur

TEXT.French: Maître de la Pensée et de l'Esprit
TEXT.German: Meister des Verstandes und des Geistes

TEXT.English: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.French: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.German: Der Baum des Lebens kann den Zauber Baum des Lebens in Städten zaubern. +10 Nahrung, +5 Zufriedenheit, +5 Gesundheit.
TEXT.Italian: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.Spanish: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.

TEXT.English: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.French: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.German: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Italian: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Spanish: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.

TEXT.English: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.French: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.Italian: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.Spanish: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.

TEXT.English: Available only to those that have mastered all 5 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.French: Available only to units that have mastered all 5 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.German: Available only to units that have mastered all 5 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Italian: Available only to units that have mastered all 5 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Spanish: Available only to units that have mastered all 5 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.

TEXT.English: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.French: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.German: Kollateralschaden: 60% bis 90% max, wirkt auf 2 Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.Spanish: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.

TEXT.English: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.French: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.German: Nutze den Heiligen Rächer, um die Kräfte der Dunkelheit zu zerschlagen.
TEXT.Italian: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.Spanish: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.

TEXT.German: Grants 66% chance in practice to Twincast
TEXT.Italian: Grants 66% chance in practice to Twincast
TEXT.Spanish: Grants 66% chance in practice to Twincast

TEXT.English: Effects of Frozen Lands are permanent
TEXT.French: Effects of Terres gelées are permanent
TEXT.German: Effects of Gefrorene Lande are permanent
TEXT.Italian: Effects of Frozen Lands are permanent
TEXT.Spanish: Effects of Frozen Lands are permanent

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the city does not have access to Fresh Water

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the city does not have access to Fresh Water

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Recruits 1 unit per 3 population in the city to your cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Order state religion doubles the amount of recruits[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Removes 1 population point for every 5 units granted
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recruits 1 unit per 3 population in the city to your cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Order state religion doubles the amount of recruits[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Removes 1 population point for every 5 units granted
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Rekrutiert 1 Einheit je 3 Bevölkerung in der gewählten Stadt[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eine Staatsreligion verdoppelt die Menge an Rekruten.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verbraucht 1 Bevölkerung je 5 erhaltenen Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Recruits 1 unit per 3 population in the city to your cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Order state religion doubles the amount of recruits[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Removes 1 population point for every 5 units granted

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les villes comptent dans la limite d'exemplaires de l'unité
[ICON_BULLET]Les frontières ne sont pas modifiées par les combats.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erlaubt die Einflussnahme von Kampf auf Kultur

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a victory by %d1%.

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a defeat by %d1%.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Modifies culture change after a defeat by %d1%.

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]This unit does not influence culture via combat.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Prevents the City's borders from being influenced by combat.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Prevents the City's borders from being influenced by combat.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verhindert die Einflussnahme auf die Stadtgrenzen durch Kampf
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Prevents the City's borders from being influenced by combat.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Prevents the City's borders from being influenced by combat.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by 1, up to a limit of 8
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Accroît la population de la ville de 1, à concurrence de 8
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Bevölkerung der Stadt um 1, bis zu einem Maximum von 8
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by 1, up to a limit of 8
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the population of the city by 1, up to a limit of 8

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% de soins suite à un combat
